name: OVRDOZE
description:
You are no hero. 

Mow them down.

Take them all with no hesitation.

You are up against ever increasing hordes of zombies and thugs as you try to cling on to your life. Collect items and weapons to increase your odds of surviving. Build sentries and barricades to defend your flank. 

CONTROLS

 - WASD MOVEMENT.

Shift to run. Space to dash. Control to sneak.

- MOUSE CONTROLS GUN.

aim by angle of mouse to player,

the bullet spread is determined by movement and recoil.

-TAB OPENS INVENTORY

where you can drag things from boxes with your mouse and store them. 

- F SEARCHES BOXES

opens both the box and your inventory: manipulation is done via mouse. Shift-click to quickly transfer the item to your inventory.

- G THROWS GRENADES

throws a grenade about where the mouse is.

- Q TO CYCLE THROUGH GRENADES

You can switch between grenades by pressing Q.

- USING ITEMS

For items that are useable/placeable: right click on them.

In the case of barricades: highlight the ground where you want to place the barricade - green is placeable, red is not.

Given enough time barricades will fall under the horde.

- MIND YOUR SANITY

Consume narcotics to regain sanity and survive.

This is a pygame game made in ten months. Programming, music, 3D work and most sprites made by me. The game is not finished yet, the "story" mode and multiplayer are not fully fleshed out, but I'm putting this project on hold now.
